XXLChess

接口 KnightMove

  • 所有已知实现类:
    Amazon, Archbishop, Chancellor, General, Knight

    public interface KnightMove
    Represents the movement behavior of a knight in chess.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 默认方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      default void knightAddTiles(Board board, Tile tile, java.util.ArrayList<Tile> lsTile, java.util.ArrayList<Tile> capturedTiles, boolean isWhite)
      Adds the target tiles that a knight can move to based on its current position.

    • 方法详细资料

      • knightAddTiles

        default void knightAddTiles(Board board,
                            Tile tile,
                            java.util.ArrayList<Tile> lsTile,
                            java.util.ArrayList<Tile> capturedTiles,
                            boolean isWhite)
        Adds the target tiles that a knight can move to based on its current position.
        参数:
        board - The game board.
        tile - The current tile of the knight.
        lsTile - The list to store the target tiles.
        capturedTiles - The list to store the captured tiles.
        isWhite - Indicates whether the knight is white (true) or black (false).
